project.name: OpenVeo test API
project.description: Unit tests and end to end tests API for OpenVeo

e2e.name: e2e
e2e.description: Exposes a list of modules to help writing end to end tests on OpenVeo using protractor.

unit.name: unit
unit.description: Exposes a list of modules to help writing server unit tests on OpenVeo using mocha.

TableAssert.name: TableAssert
TableAssert.description: Creates a table assertion helper to help writing assertions for table pages.

params.name: page
params.description: The table page to test

CheckboxesField.name: CheckboxesField
CheckboxesField.description:
A form checkboxes field.

Use Field.get method to get an instance of CheckboxesField.

DateField.name: DateField
DateField.description:
A form date field.

Use Field.get method to get an instance of DateField.

Field.name: Field
Field.description:
A form field to help writing end to end tests.

Help manipulate form fields in a Page.
Use Field.get() method to get a Field instance.

SelectField.name: SelectField
SelectField.description:
A form select field.

Use Field.get method to get an instance of SelectField.

TextField.name: TextField
TextField.description:
A form text field.

Use Field.get method to get an instance of TextField.

TextareaField.name: TextareaField
TextareaField.description:
A form text field.

Use Field.get method to get an instance of TextareaField.

TimeField.name: TimeField
TimeField.description:
A form time field.

Use Field.get method to get an instance of TimeField.

BackEndPage.name: BackEndPage
BackEndPage.description:
A back end page to help writing end to end tests on OpenVeo back end pages.

Do not use this directly but extend it.

Page.name: Page
Page.description:
A web page to help writing end to end tests with protractor for OpenVeo.

Do not use this directly but extend it.

TablePage.name: TablePage
TablePage.description:
Creates a new TablePage representing a back end page with a table and form to add an entity.

Do not use this directly but extend it.

params.name: model
params.description: Model to interact directly with the database

browser.name: browser
browser.description: Helps using some protractor browser features.

generator.name: generator
generator.description: Provides functions to interact with the file system as an extension to the Node.js filesystem module.

classitems.description:
Checks that table navigation is working.

Use table navigation links to navigate on pages and verify, on each page, the current page, total pages,
total lines and the number of lines in the page.
classitems.name: checkNavigation

params.name: totalElements
params.description: The total number of elements

params.name: numberPerPage
params.description: The number of elements displayed per page

params.name: index
params.description: The page index

return.description: Promise resolving when navigation has been checked

classitems.description:
Checks if lines are correctly sorted for both ascending and descending order.

You don't need to add lines to the table before calling this method. Necessary lines are automatically added
and then removed using page addLinesByPassAuto / removeLinesByPass methods.
classitems.name: checkSort

params.name: property
params.description: The name of the column to sort on

return.description: Promise resolving when sort has been checked

classitems.description:
Checks if buttons to change the number of displayed items per page are displayed correctly depending on the
actual number of lines in the table.
classitems.name: checkItemsPerPageButtons

return.description: Promise resolving when buttons have been checked

classitems.description:
Checks if buttons to change the number of displayed items per page are correctly displayed regarding the
total number of lines.

You don't need to add lines to the table before calling this method. Necessary lines are automatically added
and then removed using page addLinesByPassAuto / removeLinesByPass methods.
classitems.name: checkItemsPerPage

return.description: Promise resolving when buttons per page have been checked

classitems.description:
Checks if removing several lines at the same time works correctly.

You don't need to add lines to the table before calling this method. Necessary lines are automatically added
and then removed using page addLinesByPassAuto / removeLinesByPass methods.
classitems.name: checkMassiveRemove

return.description: Promise resolving when massive remove has been checked

classitems.description:
Checks if pagination works correctly.

You don't need to add lines to the table before calling this method. Necessary lines are automatically added
and then removed using page addLinesByPassAuto / removeLinesByPass methods.
classitems.name: checkPagination

return.description: Promise resolving when pagination has been checked

classitems.description: Checks if search engine works correctly.
classitems.name: checkSearch

params.name: search
params.description: A search description object

params.name: expectedValues
params.description: The expected list of line values corresponding to the research

params.name: columnName
params.description: The name of the column to extract value from and compare to expectedValues

return.description: Promise resolving when search has been checked

classitems.description:
Checks if canceling a remove action is working correctly.

You don't need to add lines to the table before calling this method. Necessary lines are automatically added
and then removed using page addLinesByPassAuto / removeLinesByPass methods.
classitems.name: checkCancelRemove

return.description: Promise resolving when cancel is checked

classitems.description:
Checks if selecting lines works.

You don't need to add lines to the table before calling this method. Necessary lines are automatically added
and then removed using page addLinesByPassAuto / removeLinesByPass methods.
classitems.name: checkLinesSelection

params.name: columnTitle
params.description: The name of the column to get lines

return.description: Promise resolving when selection is checked

classitems.description: Gets selected checkboxe names.
classitems.name: getValue

return.description: Promise resolving with selected checkboxes

classitems.description: Sets field value.
classitems.name: setValue

params.name: values
params.description: Checkboxe's values

return.description: Promise resolving when checkboxes are checked

classitems.description: Unchecks all checkboxes.
classitems.name: clear

return.description: Promise resolving when the field is cleared

classitems.description: Field label.
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: Element from where to look for the field (typically the form element).
classitems.name: baseElement

classitems.description: Gets an instance of a Field.
classitems.name: get

params.name: conf
params.description: A field configuration object

return.description: An instance of a Field sub object

classitems.description: Gets field description.
classitems.name: getDescription

return.description: Promise resolving with the description

classitems.description: Gets field label.
classitems.name: getLabel

return.description: Promise resolving with the label

classitems.description:
Gets field element wrapper.

Look for a form element label and return its parent.
classitems.name: getElement

return.description: Promise resolving with the element

classitems.description: Gets field error message.
classitems.name: getErrorMessage

return.description: Promise resolving with the error message

classitems.description: Gets field text representation in case of an inline editable field.
classitems.name: getText

return.description: Promise resolving with field text representation

classitems.description: Gets field value.
classitems.name: getValue

return.description: Promise resolving with field value

classitems.description: Sets field value.
classitems.name: setValue

params.name: value
params.description: Field's value depending on its type

return.description: Promise resolving when the value is set

classitems.description: Clears field value.
classitems.name: clear

return.description: Promise resolving when the field is cleared

classitems.description: Tests if a field is considered as on error.
classitems.name: isOnError

return.description: Promise resolving with a boolean indicating if the field is on error

classitems.description: Gets field value.
classitems.name: getValue

return.description: Promise resolving with the name of the selected option (not the value)

classitems.description: Sets field value.
classitems.name: setValue

params.name: value
params.description: The name of the option to select (not the value)

return.description: Promise resolving when the field is filled

classitems.description:
Clears field value.

This will select the first option of the select element.
classitems.name: clear

return.description: Promise resolving when the field is cleared

classitems.description: Tag name of the text field.
classitems.name: fieldTag

classitems.description: Gets field value.
classitems.name: getValue

return.description: Promise resolving with field value

classitems.description: Sets field value.
classitems.name: setValue

params.name: value
params.description: Field's value

return.description: Promise resolving when the field is filled

classitems.description: Clears field value.
classitems.name: clear

return.description: Promise resolving when the field is cleared

classitems.description: Tests if a field is considered as on error.
classitems.name: isOnError

return.description: Promise resolving with a boolean indicating if the field is on error

classitems.description: Gets field value.
classitems.name: getValue

return.description: Promise resolving with field value

classitems.description:
Sets field value.

Actually it's not possible to use the Web Driver to set the value of the input in time state.
Until this feature is added to the Web Driver, value of the input is set programmatically.
Be careful events on the input won't be dispatched (change, click and so on).
classitems.name: setValue

params.name: value
params.description: Field's value format as hh:mm:ss

return.description: Promise resolving when the field is filled

classitems.description: Clears field value.
classitems.name: clear

return.description: Promise resolving when the field is cleared

classitems.description: List of alert elements.
classitems.name: alertElements

classitems.description: Popover element.
classitems.name: popoverElement

classitems.description: Button to toggle left menu.
classitems.name: toggleLeftMenuLinkElement

classitems.description:
Left menu wrapper element.

Displayed or not as the left menu is opened or not.
classitems.name: leftMenuElement

classitems.description: Profile link element.
classitems.name: profileLinkElement

classitems.description: Language link element to open the list of languages.
classitems.name: languageLinkElement

classitems.description: Logout link element.
classitems.name: logoutLinkElement

classitems.description: List of first level link elements in left menu.
classitems.name: level1MenuLinkElements

classitems.description: List of back end translations.
classitems.name: translations

classitems.description:
Looks for a menu item and click on it.

This will look for the item in menu and sub menus to find the item by its name.
classitems.name: clickMenuRecursive

params.name: elements
params.description: Menu items elements

params.name: itemName
params.description: Name of the menu item to look for

return.description: A promise resolving when the menu item is clicked

classitems.description:
Loads the page and select the first available language.

This will automatically select the first language in the list of available languages.
classitems.name: load

return.description: Promise resolving when the page is loaded and language changed

classitems.description:
Sets page language.

It uses the top menu to change the language, a page reload will be performed.
classitems.name: selectLanguage

params.name: language
params.description: The language to load

return.description: Promise resolving when the page is reloaded with the expected language

classitems.description: Gets language link element.
classitems.name: getLanguageOption

params.name: languageCode
params.description: The language code to load (e.g. en)

return.description: The language option element

classitems.description:
Authenticates to the back end using the given account.

If an account is already logged in, it will be logged out.
classitems.name: logAs

params.name: user
params.description: Information about the user

return.description: Promise resolving when authenticated to the back end

classitems.description:
Logs to the back end using the super administrator account.

The super administrator can perform any actions.
If an account is already logged in, it will be logged out. Super administrator is also locked.
classitems.name: logAsAdmin

return.description: Promise resolving when authenticated as the super administrator

classitems.description: Gets current logged in user.
classitems.name: getUser

return.description: The current logged in user

classitems.description:
Logs out current authenticated user.

This will lead to the login page.
classitems.name: logout

return.description: Promise resolving when user is logged out and login page is displayed

classitems.description: Gets the list of available languages.
classitems.name: getLanguages

return.description: The list of available languages

classitems.description:
Gets a level 1 menu items.

All elements corresponding to the item name will be returned.
classitems.name: getLevel1MenuItems

params.name: itemName
params.description: The translated name of the menu item

return.description: Promise resolving with the list of elements corresponding to the given name

classitems.description: Opens left menu.
classitems.name: openMenu

return.description: Promise resolving when left menu is opened

classitems.description: Closes menu.
classitems.name: closeMenu

return.description: Promise resolving when menu is closed

classitems.description: Opens an item sub menu.
classitems.name: openSubMenu

params.name: itemName
params.description: The name of the menu item

return.description: Promise resolving when sub menu is opened

classitems.description: Closes an item sub menu by its name.
classitems.name: closeSubMenu

params.name: itemName
params.description: The name of the menu item having a sub menu

return.description: Promise resolving when sub menu is closed

classitems.description:
Clicks on a menu item.

This will look for the item in menu and sub menus to find the item by its name.
classitems.name: clickMenu

params.name: itemName
params.description: The name of the menu item

return.description: Promise resolving when menu is clicked

classitems.description: Clicks on profile link.
classitems.name: clickProfile

return.description: Promise resolving when profile link is clicked

classitems.description: Closes all alerts.
classitems.name: closeAlerts

return.description: Promise resolving when all alerts are closed

classitems.description: Gets all alert messages.
classitems.name: getAlertMessages

return.description: Promise resolving with all alert messages

classitems.description: Protractor expected conditions.
classitems.name: EC

classitems.description: Protractor control flow.
classitems.name: flow

classitems.description: Body element.
classitems.name: bodyElement

classitems.description:
Page element.

Page wrapper holding the content scrollbar.
classitems.name: pageElement

classitems.description: Loads the page.
classitems.name: load

return.description: Promise resolving when the page is fully loaded

classitems.description: Gets page title as described by the HTMLTitleElement.
classitems.name: getTitle

return.description: Promise resolving with the title of the page

classitems.description: Removes all cookies on the actual page.
classitems.name: deleteCookies

return.description: Promise resolving when all cookies are deleted

classitems.description:
Sends an http request and return its reponse.

This will execute the request from the page.

params.name: path
params.description: Request's path

params.name: method
params.description: HTTP method to use

params.name: data
params.description: Request's data to send in body

return.description: Promise resolving with the request's response

classitems.description: Refreshes actual page.
classitems.name: refresh

return.description: Promise resolving when the page is fully loaded

classitems.description:
Handles page loaded.

Use this method to perform actions after the page is loaded. Typically, verify that the page is loaded by
waiting for elements to be present on the page.

By default it does nothing, override it to define your own behaviour.
classitems.name: onLoaded

return.description: Promise resolving when the page is fully loaded

classitems.description: Form element to add a new entity.
classitems.name: addFormElement

classitems.description: Link to open / close form element to add a new entity.
classitems.name: addLinkElement

classitems.description:
Wrapper of the add form element.

This element will be displayed when add form is displayed and hidden when add form is closed.
classitems.name: addFormWrapperElement

classitems.description: Submit button of the form to add a new entity.
classitems.name: addButtonElement

classitems.description: Table element.
classitems.name: tableElement

classitems.description: Table row elements.
classitems.name: rowElements

classitems.description: Table header elements.
classitems.name: headerElements

classitems.description: Opened line detail containing information about the opened line.
classitems.name: lineDetailElement

classitems.description: Checkbox to select all line.
classitems.name: selectAllElement

classitems.description: Main action button element to perform actions on all selected lines.
classitems.name: actionsButtonElement

classitems.description: Element holding the list of actions under main action button.
classitems.name: actionsElement

classitems.description: Dialog box.
classitems.name: dialogElement

classitems.description: Dialog box confirmation button.
classitems.name: dialogConfirmActionButtonElement

classitems.description: Dialog box cancel button.
classitems.name: dialogCancelActionButtonElement

classitems.description: Search engine form to filter lines in the table.
classitems.name: searchFormElement

classitems.description: Link to open / close search engine.
classitems.name: searchLinkElement

classitems.description: Element holding the current table page (pagination).
classitems.name: currentPageElement

classitems.description: Element holding the total number of table pages (pagination).
classitems.name: totalPagesElement

classitems.description: Element holding the total number of lines in all table pages (pagination).
classitems.name: totalLinesElement

classitems.description: Pagination links wrapper.
classitems.name: paginationElement

classitems.description: List of pagination links, including the previous and next range buttons.
classitems.name: paginationLinkElements

classitems.description: List of pagination links, excluding the previous and next range buttons.
classitems.name: paginationPageLinkElements

classitems.description: Pagination previous range link.
classitems.name: paginationPreviousRangeElement

classitems.description: Pagination next range link.
classitems.name: paginationNextRangeElement

classitems.description: List of per page links to select the number of elements to display per table page.
classitems.name: itemsPerPageLinkElements

classitems.description:
Finds a line.

Iterate through the given list of lines to look for the expected one.
classitems.name: getLineByIndex

params.name: lines
params.description: The list of line elements (tr elements) to look into

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the line to look for (this value will be compared to the value of each cell)

params.name: index
params.description: The index in lines to start from

return.description: Promise resolving with the tr element

classitems.description:
Finds a line by page.

Iterate through all lines of all pages to look for the expected line.
It starts at current page.
classitems.name: getLineByPage

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the line to look for (this value will be compared to the value of each cell)

params.name: totalPages
params.description: The total number of pages

return.description: Promise resolving with the searched line (tr element)

classitems.description:
Selects a page.

Look for page link in pagination links, if page link is not in the pagination actual range, it will search for
the page link in the other pagination ranges.
classitems.name: selectPageByRange

params.name: page
params.description: The page to select (starting at 1 instead of 0)

return.description: Promise resolving when the page is selected

classitems.description: Gets the index of a table column in the list of columns.
classitems.name: getHeaderIndex

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the header to look for

return.description: Promise resolving with the index of the column

classitems.description:
Gets column value for a list of lines.

Iterates through the given list of lines and find its value in the given column.
classitems.name: getLineValuesByIndex

params.name: lines
params.description: The lines in the page (tr elements)

params.name: headerIndex
params.description: The index of the column to read

params.name: index
params.description: Current line index being inspected

return.description: Promise resolving with lines values

classitems.description:
Gets column and field values for a list of lines.

Iterates through the given list of lines and get all information (column values and field values) for each line.
classitems.name: getAllLineDetailsByIndex

params.name: lines
params.description: The lines in the page (tr elements)

params.name: index
params.description: Current line index being inspected

return.description: Promise resolving with values

classitems.description:
Gets line column values in all pages.

Iterate through all lines of all pages and get column value for each line.
It starts at current page.
classitems.name: getLineValuesByPage

params.name: headerIndex
params.description: The index of the column to read

params.name: totalPages
params.description: The total number of pages

return.description: Promise resolving with column values

classitems.description:
Gets line fields values in all pages.

Iterate through all lines of all pages and get columns / fields values for each line.
It starts at current page.
classitems.name: getAllLineDetailsByPage

params.name: totalPages
params.description: The total number of pages

return.description: Promise resolving with values

classitems.description: Gets all lines in the table page except the opened one.
classitems.name: getLinesInPage

return.description: Promise resolving with the list of lines elements in the page (tr elements)

classitems.description: Gets a line within the current page.
classitems.name: getLineInPage

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the line to look for (each column will be compared to this value)

return.description: Promise resolving with the line (tr element)

classitems.description: Gets the number of lines in the current page.
classitems.name: getLinesInPageNumber

return.description: Promise resolving with the number of lines in the page

classitems.description: Opens add form.
classitems.name: openAddForm

return.description: Promise resolving when add form is opened

classitems.description: Closes formular to add an item.
classitems.name: closeAddForm

return.description: Promise resolving when add form is closed

classitems.description: Submit formular to add an item.
classitems.name: submitAddForm

return.description: Promise resolving when add form submit button has been clicked

classitems.description:
Gets a line.

Looks for a line in all pages.
classitems.name: getLine

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving with the line (tr element)

classitems.description: Gets values of a column for all lines in all pages.
classitems.name: getLineValues

params.name: headerTitle
params.description: Title of the column to extract values from

return.description: Promise resolving with the list of values

classitems.description: Gets values of a column for all lines in current page.
classitems.name: getLineInPageValues

params.name: headerTitle
params.description: Title of the column to extract values from

return.description: Promise resolving with the list of values

classitems.description: Gets all column / fields values for all lines in all pages.
classitems.name: getAllLineDetails

return.description: Promise resolving with the list of line details

classitems.description: Gets all column / field values of a line.
classitems.name: getLineDetails

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving with the line details

classitems.description: Gets all column values for a line.
classitems.name: getLineCells

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving with the line column values

classitems.description: Gets all fields values for a line.
classitems.name: getLineFieldValues

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving with the line fields values

classitems.description: Opens a line.
classitems.name: openLine

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving when line is opened

classitems.description: Closes opened line.
classitems.name: closeLine

return.description: Promise resolving when line is closed

classitems.description:
Tests if a line is opened.

As only one line can be opened at a time, no name is required.
classitems.name: isOpenedLine

return.description: Promise resolving with a boolean indicating if a line is opened or not

classitems.description: Selects a line by checking the line checkbox.
classitems.name: selectLine

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving when line is selected

classitems.description:
Selects all lines.

At least, one line must be in the table.
classitems.name: selectAllLines

return.description: Promise resolving when all lines are selected

classitems.description: Sorts lines.
classitems.name: sortBy

params.name: name
params.description: The value of the column to act on, each column will be compared to this value

params.name: asc
params.description: true to sort in ascendant order, false to sort in descendant order

return.description: Promise resolving when column is clicked

classitems.description: Performs an action on a single line.
classitems.name: performAction

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

params.name: action
params.description: The translated name of the action to perform

params.name: confirm
params.description: true to confirm the action, false otherwise

return.description: Promise resolving when action is performed

classitems.description:
Performs a grouped action.

At least one line must be selected.
classitems.name: performMultipleAction

params.name: action
params.description: The translated name of the action to perform

params.name: confirm
params.description: true to confirm the action, false otherwise

return.description: Promise resolving when the action is performed

classitems.description:
Accepts the confirmation dialog.

Confirmation dialog must be displayed.
classitems.name: confirmAction

return.description: Promise resolving when confirmation dialog has been accepted

classitems.description:
Cancels the confirmation dialog.

Confirmation dialog must be displayed.
classitems.name: cancelAction

return.description: Promise resolving when confirmation dialog has been canceled

classitems.description: Gets the list of available actions for a line.
classitems.name: getLineActions

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving whith the list of actions

classitems.description: Gets the list of global actions available.
classitems.name: getGlobalActions

return.description: Promise resolving whith the list of global actions

classitems.description:
Searches in the list of lines using search engine.

Fills search fields.
classitems.name: search

params.name: fields
params.description: List of values for fields returned by method getSearchFields

return.description: Promise resolving when search is done

classitems.description: Clears search fields.
classitems.name: clearSearch

return.description: Promise resolving when fields are cleared

classitems.description: Opens search engine.
classitems.name: openSearchEngine

return.description: Promise resolving when search engine is opened

classitems.description: Closes search engine.
classitems.name: closeSearchEngine

return.description: Promise resolving when search engine is closed

classitems.description: Gets current page number.
classitems.name: getCurrentPage

return.description: Promise resolving with the current page (starting at 1)

classitems.description: Gets total number of pages.
classitems.name: getTotalPages

return.description: Promise resolving with the total number of pages

classitems.description: Gets total number of lines.
classitems.name: getTotalLines

return.description: Promise resolving with the total number of lines

classitems.description:
Gets the total number of page links.

Gets the number of page links in the pagination.
classitems.name: getTotalPaginationLinks

return.description: Promise resolving with the total number of links

classitems.description: Selects the first page in pagination.
classitems.name: selectFirstPage

return.description: Promise resolving when first page is selected

classitems.description: Selects the last page in pagination.
classitems.name: selectLastPage

return.description: Promise resolving when last page is selected

classitems.description: Selects a page in pagination.
classitems.name: selectPage

params.name: page
params.description: The page to select (starting at 1)

return.description: Promise resolving when page is selected

classitems.description: Selects first page range in pagination.
classitems.name: selectFirstPageRange

return.description: Promise resolving when first page range is selected

classitems.description: Selects last page range in pagination.
classitems.name: selectLastPageRange

return.description: Promise resolving when last page range is selected

classitems.description: Selects previous page range in pagination.
classitems.name: selectPreviousPageRange

return.description: Promise resolving when previous page range is selected

classitems.description: Selects next page range in pagination.
classitems.name: selectNextPageRange

return.description: Promise resolving when next page range is selected

classitems.description: Tests if previous page range link is enabled.
classitems.name: isPreviousRangeLinkEnabled

return.description: Promise resolving whith a boolean indicating if the previous range link is enabled

classitems.description: Tests if next page range link is enabled.
classitems.name: isNextRangeLinkEnabled

return.description: Promise resolving whith a boolean indicating if the next range link is enabled

classitems.description: Sets the desired number of lines to display in the table.
classitems.name: setLinesNumber

params.name: linesNumbers
params.description: Either 5, 10, 20 or 30

return.description: Promise resolving when the expected number of lines is set

classitems.description: Moves the cursor over the "select all" checkbox to display the information popover.
classitems.name: setSelectAllMouseOver

return.description: Promise resolving when the mouse is over the "select all" checkbox

classitems.description: Tests if a header exists.
classitems.name: isTableHeader

params.name: name
params.description: The title of the header to look for

return.description: Promise resolving with a boolean indicating if the table header exists or not

classitems.description:
Gets the index of a header in the list of headers.

Be careful, the header index starts at 1 (not 0) due to the checkboxes occupying first column on each line.
classitems.name: getTableHeaderIndex

params.name: name
params.description: The title of the header to look for

return.description: Promise resolving with the index of the header

classitems.description: Removes a line.
classitems.name: removeLine

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving when the line has been removed

classitems.description: Removes all lines in the page.
classitems.name: removeAllLinesInPage

return.description: Promise resolving when lines have been removed

classitems.description: Removes all selected lines in the page.
classitems.name: removeAllSelectedLinesInPage

return.description: Promise resolving when lines have been removed

classitems.description:
Adds multiple lines at the same time.

This method bypass the web browser to directly add lines into database.
Using this method will reload the page.
classitems.name: addLinesByPass

params.name: lines
params.description: A list of lines to add

params.name: refresh
params.description: Request for a refresh after adding lines

return.description: Promise resolving when lines are added and browser page has been reloaded

classitems.description:
Adds multiple lines at the same time with automatic index.

This method bypass the web browser to directly add lines into database.
Using this method will reload the page.

All created lines will have the same name suffixed by the index.
classitems.name: addLinesByPassAuto

params.name: name
params.description: Base name of the lines to add

params.name: total
params.description: Number of lines to add

params.name: offset
params.description: Index to start from for the name suffix

params.name: refresh
params.description: Request for a refresh after adding lines

return.description: Promise resolving with the added lines and when browser page has been reloaded

classitems.description:
Removes multiple lines at the same time.

This method bypass the web browser to directly remove lines from database.
Using this method will reload the page.
classitems.name: removeLinesByPass

params.name: lines
params.description: A list of lines

params.name: refresh
params.description: Request for a refresh after adding lines

return.description: Promise resolving when lines are removed and browser page has been reloaded

classitems.description: Tests if the edition form is in error.
classitems.name: isEditionFormOnError

return.description: Promise resolving with a boolean indicating if the edition form is on error

classitems.description: Gets the list of edition form error messages.
classitems.name: getEditionFormErrors

return.description: Promise resolving with the list of errors

classitems.description: Gets a field text for a line.
classitems.name: getLineFieldText

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

params.name: field
params.description: The field id as described by getEditFormFields() method

return.description: Promise resolving with the field text

classitems.description: Gets column value for a line.
classitems.name: getLineCellValue

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

params.name: index
params.description: Index of the column to read

return.description: Promise resolving with the cell value

classitems.description: Gets all column values for a line.
classitems.name: getLineCellValues

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

return.description: Promise resolving with all cell values

classitems.description: Tests if line cells contain a text.
classitems.name: lineCellContain

params.name: lineFinder
params.description:
The name of the line (each column will be compared to this value) or
the line element

params.name: value
params.description: Value to look for

return.description: Promise resolving with a boolean indicating if the given value correspond to a cell

classitems.description:
Adds a new line.

User must be logged and have permission to create line on this page.
classitems.name: addLine

params.name: name
params.description: Line name

params.name: data
params.description: Additional data depending on page type

return.description: Promise resolving when the line has been added

classitems.description: Gets search engine fields.

params.name: Search
params.description: engine form element

return.description: The list of fields

classitems.description: Gets add form fields.
classitems.name: getAddFormFields

params.name: Add
params.description: form element

return.description: The list of fields

classitems.description: Gets edit form fields.
classitems.name: getEditFormFields

params.name: Edit
params.description: form element

return.description: The list of fields

classitems.description:
Generates a screenshot each time a test failed.

For more more information about plugins refer to protractor's documentation available at
https://github.com/angular/protractor/blob/master/docs/plugins.md
Writes screenshot to a file.
classitems.name: writeScreenShot

params.name: data
params.description: Screenshot data

params.name: file
params.description: Screenshot final file path

params.name: callback
params.description:
The function to call when done
  - **Error** The error if an error occurred, null otherwise

classitems.description:
Clicks on an element.

There are many issues with click events in web drivers, the same click is sometimes performed, and sometimes not.
Moving the cursor to the element then performing a click seems to be more stable.
It also checks if the element is clickable before clicking on it.

Also the banner in position fix prevent the driver to click on elements behind it. To avoid this problem, scroll
up to the element minus the height of the banner.
classitems.name: click

params.name: elementFinder
params.description: The element to click

params.name: delay
params.description: The delay in milliseconds to wait before clicking on the element

return.description: Promise resolving when element is clicked

classitems.description: Sets browser's size.
example:
var browserAPI = require('@openveo/test').e2e.browser;
    browserAPI.setSize(800, 600);
classitems.name: setSize

params.name: width
params.description: The browser width in px

params.name: height
params.description: The browser height in px

return.description: Promise resolving when the browser size is set

classitems.description: Sets process.protractorConf to the configuration of the actual capability.
example:
var browserAPI = require('@openveo/test').e2e.browser;
    browserAPI.init();
classitems.name: init

return.description: Promise resolving when init is done

classitems.description: Disables all animations.
example:
var browserAPI = require('@openveo/test').e2e.browser;
    browserAPI.deactivateAnimations();
classitems.name: deactivateAnimations

classitems.description: Takes a screenshot of the actual browser state.
example:
var browserAPI = require('@openveo/test').e2e.browser;
    browserAPI.takeScreenshot('/tmp', 'myScreenshot');
classitems.name: takeScreenshot

params.name: file
params.description: The screenshot file path

params.name: fileName
params.description: The screenshot file name without the extension

return.description: Promise resolving when the capture is made

classitems.description: Gets translations.
classitems.name: getTranslations

params.name: dictionary
params.description:
The name of the dictionary, this is the name of the dictionary file without
extension

params.name: languageCode
params.description: The language code (e.g. en)

return.description: Promise resolving with the list of translations

classitems.description: Gets the list of back end translations.
classitems.name: getBackEndTranslations

params.name: languageCode
params.description: The language code (e.g. en)

return.description: Promise resolving with the list of translations

classitems.description: Generates and set up a database which always succeed.
example:
var ut = require('@openveo/test').unit.generator;
    ut.generateSuccessDatabase();
classitems.name: generateSuccessDatabase

classitems.description: Generates and set up a database which always fails.
example:
var ut = require('@openveo/test').unit.generator;
    ut.generateFailDatabase();
classitems.name: generateFailDatabase

classitems.description: Generates fake web service scopes into application storage.
example:
var ut = require('@openveo/test').unit.generator;
    ut.generateWebServiceScopes();
classitems.name: generateWebServiceScopes

classitems.description: Generates fake permissions into application storage.
example:
var ut = require('@openveo/test').unit.generator;
    ut.generatePermissions();
classitems.name: generatePermissions

This will execute the request from the page.
